net.jawr.web.context
Class ThreadLocalJawrContext

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.context.ThreadLocalJawrContext

public class ThreadLocalJawrContext
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the context for Jawr, it holds the context in a ThreadLocal object.

Author:
Matt Ruby, Ibrahim Chaehoi
